FulfillmentWorkspaceItem.name: FulfillmentWorkspaceItem
FulfillmentWorkspaceItem.description: Represents information about the attributes that are used in the definition for a fulfillment step group.

FulfillmentWorkspaceId.description: The ID of the parent fulfillment workspace that's related to this record.

Name.description: The name of the fulfillment workspace item.

ShowOrder.description: The display sequence value of the fulfillment workspace item.
